title: Smart Water Analytics System for Demand Forecasting of Water Consumption and Analysis
conference: International Conference on Advances in Computing Technologies
abstract: Developed a smart analytics platform for forecasting water usage trends in Bengaluru, optimizing water distribution systems for resource efficiency.

title: A Survey on Intrusion Detection Systems using Deep Reinforcement Learning
conference: International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
abstract: Conducted a comprehensive survey of Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) techniques applied to cybersecurity intrusion detection systems.
